article_title: Campaigns against Planned Parenthood gut civil discourse, hurt millions of women
article_text: Anti-abortion hate speech is taking its toll and it has to stop. One in three American women will have an abortion in her lifetime. One in three American women undergo this legal and constitutionally protected procedure. It has become clear that leaders in the public eye are equating safe and legal medical services with mass murder. The not-so-veiled suggestion here is that targeting our providers and patients is a logical and moral act.

article_metadata.description: OPINION: Violence and dishonest discourse have Planned Parenthood fighting an uphill battle in Congress and on the opinion pages.

og.description: OPINION: Violence and dishonest discourse have Planned Parenthood fighting an uphill battle in Congress and on the opinion pages.

It has become clear that leaders in the public eye are equating safe and legal medical services with mass murder.
